title: Neko Hiki no Oruorane
synopsis: During the holiday season, a young man encounters a drunken cat belonging to an old man in an alley. The old man has trained his three cats to sing.
staff: [['Nishikubo, Mizuho', ['Director']], ['Tanaka, Hideyuki', ['Sound Director']], ['Saitou, Kazuya', ['Animation Check']], ['Murata, Toshiharu', ['Animation Director', ' Character Design']]]
